appDesc.message:
(1) A utility tool integrating four AI incognito modes: Incognito Gemini Chat, Webpage Reading, Text/Screenshot, and Voice Input.
(2) For legal use, please apply for your own Google Gemini API key.
(3) This extension has no backend server for storage; users who need logging should set up their own endpoint.
appDesc.description: The description of the extension in the manifest.

popupTranslatePage.message: Translate Current Page (if Google Translate fails)

popupOpenWorkbench.description: Button text in popup.html. Changed from 'Text/Screenshot Translation Workbench'

popupOpenTutorial.message: Easy Tutorial for Gemini API Key

optionsDisplayLangLabel.message: Set the display language for the extension interface:
optionsDisplayLangLabel.description: Label for language selection in options.

optionsPrefLangSectionHeader.description: Section header for preferred languages in options.

optionsPrefLangDesc.message: Instructions: The best way is to write the language you need in the field using that language. For example: Fran√ßais, Espa√±ol, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π

optionsModelDesc.message: Select the default model for 'Translate Page', 'Smart Translation Workbench', and 'Voice Notes' features.

optionsModel1Desc.message: Best for: Multimodal understanding, real-time streaming, low cost.

optionsModel2Desc.message: Best for: Handling more tokens per request, low latency, lower cost.

optionsPresetDesc.message: Enter frequently used commands or templates here for quick access in 'Incognito Gemini Chat'.

optionsLogDesc.message: Send processing logs to your own Google Cloud Functions endpoint for research and analysis.

optionsStatusSaved.description: Status message when options are saved.

incognitoDefaultModelHeader.description: Header for default model in incognito chat.

incognitoDefaultModelDesc.message: Lite Gemini Model: Uses the model you set on the 'Settings' page (defaults to 2.0 Flash or 2.5-Flash-Lite), suitable for general translation and quick Q&A.
incognitoDefaultModelDesc.description: Description for default model in incognito chat.

incognitoFlashModelHeader.description: Header for Flash model in incognito chat.

incognitoFlashModelDesc.message: A mid-size Gemini model, suitable for tasks requiring longer context understanding or quick summarization.
incognitoFlashModelDesc.description: Description for Flash model in incognito chat.

incognitoProModelHeader.description: Header for Pro model in incognito chat.

incognitoProModelDesc.message: Google's most powerful model currently, for highly complex logical reasoning and creative generation. Note: Unit cost is high, see official pricing for details.
incognitoProModelDesc.description: Description for Pro model in incognito chat. Keep HTML tags.

incognitoPlaceholder.message: Enter prompt here, or paste (Ctrl+V) a screenshot...

incognitoFooter.message: The author, Hugo Chen, is a physician from Taiwan who completed the first version during a typhoon day in 2025. The initial version was named 'Hong-Thai' (Typhoon) in Taiwanese. If you find it useful or have any ideas, please leave a review or suggestion on the Chrome Web Store. If you're willing, you're welcome to buy me a coffee via the link on the right as a practical show of support.

errorNoActiveTab.message: Could not find the active tab.

errorOcrFailed.message: AI failed to recognize sufficient text.

errorSttFailed.message: AI failed to recognize any speech.

errorDebuggerAttach.message: Failed to attach debugger. Please reload the page or check for conflicts with other extensions.

errorOcrFailedLong.message: AI failed to recognize sufficient text content.

errorNoApiKey.message: API key has not been set.
errorNoApiKey.description: Error message in background.js and others.

errorApiRequestFailed.description: Error message in background.js. $details$ is a placeholder.

errorApiRejected.description: Error message in background.js. $reason$ is a placeholder.

errorApiStopped.description: Error message in background.js. $reason$ is a placeholder.

errorApiInvalidResponse.message: Invalid or empty API response format.

errorNetwork.message: Network error, unable to connect to Gemini API.

alertMaxImages.message: Error: You can upload a maximum of 4 images.

alertTurnLimit.message: Notice: Conversation limit of $limit$ turns reached. Please refresh the page to start a new conversation.
alertTurnLimit.description: Alert message in incognito.js. $limit$ is a placeholder.

alertNoApiKeyOptions.message: Error: Gemini API key not set. Please set it in the extension options.

readerLabelTargetLang.description: Label for the main target language selector in reader.html

readerErrorNotFound.message: Article content not found or the extracted content is empty. Please return to the original page and try again.

readerVoiceToolHeader.description: Header for voice tool in reader.

readerVoiceToolLabel.description: Label for voice tool in reader.

readerVoiceToolButton.description: Button for voice tool in reader.

readerSaveOriginal.description: Label for original text in saved file.

readerSaveTranslated.description: Label for translated text in saved file.

workbenchTextDesc.message: Suitable for selectable text from web pages, Word, or PDF. Copy and paste text below for the fastest and most accurate results.

errorPleaseUploadImage.message: Error: Please upload an image file.

voiceDesc.message:
Select your primary spoken language, click to start recording, and quickly convert your thoughts into text.
Due to browser upload size limits, this feature is recommended for short notes of a few minutes.

voiceStatusNoMicPermission.message: Could not get microphone permission. Please allow this extension to use the microphone in your browser settings.

langSystemDefault.description: Language option for system default, with placeholder for the actual language name.

langPrefA.description: Language option for preferred language A.

langPrefB.description: Language option for preferred language B.

voiceLangZhEn.description: Special language option for voice input.

voiceErrorStartRecording.description: Error message when starting recording fails.
